channel.title: [PI] Just a few questions [PI]
channel.description:
Well my server is not connecting, therefore something has to be wrong. ( Duhh. )
When I start the server up , it states "Listening on port 0.0.0.0 43594 or something like that. How would I change the server ip connection.
ALSO!
My client.java is screwed up or is all PI like that?

item.title: [PI] Just a few questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @killershand6 killershand6
item.description:
@killershand6 wrote:

[code]can u explain wht u mean by the client.java is messed up? and also r u trying to have other ppl join in.

and to change the 0.0.0.0 go in to scr/server- search 0.0.0.0 then look in the files that show up, then hit Ctrl+F
and search in that file 0.0.0.0

and to change it in the client… open up client side of yer game. find client.java search server =
then change the “0.0.0.0” to yer ip
and also below that there might be sumthing that say local server get ride of that its not needed

if it dont work ill explain more and or ill help you out u can add me on msn if u have one Killers_life2go@hotmail.com

hope i have helped u

Read full topic
